statements: SELECT * FROM patient_vitals WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT temperature, heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM patient_vitals WHERE heart_rate > 80;
SELECT patient_id, temperature FROM patient_vitals ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT heart_rate, patient_id FROM patient_vitals WHERE blood_pressure LIKE '%120%';
SELECT * FROM patient_vitals WHERE heart_rate < 60 AND temperature > 98.6;
SELECT * FROM patient_vitals WHERE heart_rate > 80 ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT patient_id, temperature FROM patient_vitals WHERE blood_pressure LIKE '120%' ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients, AVG(heart_rate) AS avg_heart_rate FROM patient_vitals WHERE blood_pressure = 'Normal';
SELECT DISTINCT temperature, blood_pressure FROM patient_vitals WHERE heart_rate BETWEEN 70 AND 90;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, blood_pressure, temperature FROM patient_vitals WHERE blood_pressure IS NOT NULL AND temperature < 98.6 ORDER BY heart_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM PatientVitals;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, temperature FROM PatientVitals WHERE heart_rate > 80;
SELECT * FROM PatientRecords WHERE admission_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, blood_pressure FROM PatientVitals ORDER BY blood_pressure DESC;
SELECT patient_id, admission_date, discharge_date FROM PatientRecords WHERE discharge_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM PatientVitals WHERE heart_rate > 80 ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT patient_id, blood_pressure FROM PatientVitals WHERE temperature > 98.6;
SELECT patient_id, admission_date, discharge_date FROM PatientRecords WHERE admission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(heart_rate), MIN(temperature) FROM PatientVitals;
SELECT pv.patient_id, pr.admission_date, pr.discharge_date FROM PatientVitals pv JOIN PatientRecords pr ON pv.patient_id = pr.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 40;
SELECT patient_name, gender, admission_date FROM Patients ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM Vitals WHERE heart_rate > 80 ORDER BY heart_rate ASC;
SELECT decision_text, physician_name FROM Decisions WHERE decision_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 40 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date FROM Patients JOIN Vitals ON Patients.patient_id = Vitals.patient_id WHERE heart_rate > 80;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(decision_id) AS num_decisions FROM Decisions GROUP BY patient_id HAVING num_decisions > 2;
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temperature, MIN(temperature) AS min_temperature FROM Vitals;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date FROM Patients ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Medications WHERE dosage > 5;
SELECT alert_type, alert_timestamp, alert_message FROM Alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical';
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, admission_date FROM Patients WHERE admission_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, dosage FROM Patients INNER JOIN Medications ON Patients.patient_id = Medications.patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, name, age, gender, admit_date FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM vitals ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT med_name, dosage, start_date, end_date FROM medications WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT alert_type, alert_message, alert_time FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' ORDER BY alert_time ASC;
SELECT name, role, department FROM staff WHERE department = 'Emergency';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT p.name, v.heart_rate, v.temperature FROM patients p JOIN vitals v ON p.patient_id = v.patient_id WHERE v.heart_rate > 80;

SELECT m.med_name, m.dosage, p.name, p.age, a.alert_message FROM medications m JOIN patients p ON m.patient_id = p.patient_id JOIN alerts a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id WHERE m.start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT s.staff_id, s.name, s.role, s.department, p.name AS patient_name, p.admit_date FROM staff s LEFT JOIN patients p ON s.staff_id = p.patient_id;
